name: Balance of life
description:
Life is about Balance. Less is more! How long can you live?

left/right or A/D to move. Space key to jump.  

Balance collecting money with eating food and taking in affection. Avoid the life bombs and their debris. Live as long as you can. 

This game was made for the Blackthorn Pod Game Jam with the limitation of 'Less is more'.  In this game, if you collect too much money, food or love, you die way quicker. So in this game, as with life, Less is more!
